argument.description: A numeric value that will be divided by m.
The number used to divide into n.

description: The PostgreSQL div function is used for integer division where n is divided by m and an integer value is returned.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT div(9, 2);
 div
-----
   4
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT div(8, 2);
 div
-----
   4
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT div(10.5, 3.1);
 div
-----
   3
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT div(10.5, -3.1);
 div
-----
  -3
(1 row)
